Sentence: Serafina Pekkala meets with Iorek Byrnison and tells him (Will) that Lee Scoresby is dead
Will and Balthamos come across the armored bears, and Will convinces Iorek Byrnison to bring him (Father) south and help him (Father) rescue Lyra
As Will and Iorek travel South, two of Lord Asriel's spies travel toward Lyra's cave with the Church's fighting force
Iorek is able to mend Will's knife, and Will and Lyra decide to go to the world of the dead and rescue all the souls trapped there
